mapper.select: SELECT c.szsdwdm,c.szsmc mc, SUM(a.total_count) total_count,SUM(a.zs_count) zs_count,SUM(a.zms_count) zms_count,SUM(a.scdjz_count) scdjz_count FROM (SELECT dwdm, COUNT(*) total_count, SUM(CASE WHEN t.zstype='不动产权' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS zs_count, SUM(CASE WHEN t.zstype='不动产证明' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS zms_count, SUM(CASE WHEN t.zstype='首次登记证' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS scdjz_count FROM bdc_dzzz_mlxx t GROUP BY dwdm ) a LEFT JOIN bdc_dzzz_config c ON a.dwdm = c.dwdm GROUP BY c.szsmc,c.szsdwdm ORDER BY c.szsdwdm
